verses.verse: And to the angel <S%G32><s%> of the church <S%G1577><s%> in Sardis <S%G4554><s%> write; <S%G1125><s%> These <S%G3592><s%> things said <S%G3004><s%> he that has <S%G2192><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and the seven <S%G2033><s%> stars; <S%G792><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> your works, <S%G2041><s%> that you have <S%G2192><s%> a name <S%G3686><s%> that you live, <S%G2198><s%> and are <S%G1488><s%> dead. <S%G3498><s%>

Be watchful, <S%G1127><s%> and strengthen <S%G4741><s%> the things which remain, <S%G3062><s%> that are ready <S%G3195><s%> to die: <S%G599><s%> for I have not found <S%G2147><s%> your works <S%G2041><s%> perfect <S%G4137><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

Remember <S%G3421><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> you have received <S%G2983><s%> and heard, <S%G191><s%> and hold <S%G5083><s%> fast, and repent. <S%G3340><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> you shall not watch, <S%G1127><s%> I will come <S%G2240><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> you as a thief, <S%G2812><s%> and you shall not know <S%G1097><s%> what <S%G4169><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> I will come <S%G2240><s%> on you.

You have <S%G2192><s%> a few <S%G3641><s%> names <S%G3686><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> in Sardis <S%G4554><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> have not defiled <S%G3435><s%> their garments; <S%G2440><s%> and they shall walk <S%G4043><s%> with me in white: <S%G3022><s%> for they are worthy. <S%G514><s%>

He that overcomes, <S%G3528><s%> the same <S%G3778><s%> shall be clothed <S%G4016><s%> in white <S%G3022><s%> raiment; <S%G2440><s%> and I will not blot <S%G1813><s%> out his name <S%G3686><s%> out of the book <S%G976><s%> of life, <S%G2222><s%> but I will confess <S%G1843><s%> his name <S%G3686><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> my Father, <S%G3962><s%> and before <S%G1799><s%> his angels. <S%G32><s%>
He that has <S%G2192><s%> an ear, <S%G3775><s%> let him hear <S%G191><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to the churches. <S%G1577><s%>

And to the angel <S%G32><s%> of the church <S%G1577><s%> in Philadelphia <S%G5359><s%> write; <S%G1125><s%> These <S%G3592><s%> things said <S%G3004><s%> he that is holy, <S%G40><s%> he that is true, <S%G228><s%> he that has <S%G2192><s%> the key <S%G2807><s%> of David, <S%G1138><s%> he that opens, <S%G455><s%> and no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> shuts; <S%G2808><s%> and shuts, <S%G2808><s%> and no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> opens; <S%G455><s%>

I know <S%G1492><s%> your works: <S%G2041><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> I have set <S%G1325><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> you an open <S%G455><s%> door, <S%G2374><s%> and no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> shut <S%G2808><s%> it: for you have <S%G2192><s%> a little <S%G3398><s%> strength, <S%G1411><s%> and have kept <S%G5083><s%> my word, <S%G3056><s%> and have not denied <S%G720><s%> my name. <S%G3686><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I will make <S%G1325><s%> them of the synagogue <S%G4864><s%> of Satan, <S%G4567><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> they are Jews, <S%G2453><s%> and are not, but do lie; <S%G5574><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> I will make <S%G4160><s%> them to come <S%G2240><s%> and worship <S%G4352><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> your feet, <S%G4228><s%> and to know <S%G1097><s%> that I have loved <S%G25><s%> you.

Because <S%G3754><s%> you have kept <S%G5083><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of my patience, <S%G5281><s%> I also <S%G2504><s%> will keep <S%G5083><s%> you from the hour <S%G5610><s%> of temptation, <S%G3986><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> shall come <S%G2064><s%> on all <S%G3650><s%> the world, <S%G3625><s%> to try <S%G3985><s%> them that dwell <S%G2730><s%> on the earth. <S%G1093><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I come <S%G2064><s%> quickly: <S%G5035><s%> hold <S%G2902><s%> that fast which <S%G3739><s%> you have, <S%G2192><s%> that no <S%G3367><s%> man <S%G3367><s%> take <S%G2983><s%> your crown. <S%G4735><s%>

Him that overcomes <S%G3528><s%> will I make <S%G4160><s%> a pillar <S%G4769><s%> in the temple <S%G3485><s%> of my God, <S%G2316><s%> and he shall go <S%G1831><s%> no <S%G3364><s%> more <S%G2089><s%> out: and I will write <S%G1125><s%> on him the name <S%G3686><s%> of my God, <S%G2316><s%> and the name <S%G3686><s%> of the city <S%G4172><s%> of my God, <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is new <S%G2537><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> comes <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> out of heaven <S%G3772><s%> from my God: <S%G2316><s%> and I will write on him my new <S%G2537><s%> name. <S%G3686><s%>
He that has <S%G2192><s%> an ear, <S%G3775><s%> let him hear <S%G191><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to the churches. <S%G1577><s%>

And to the angel <S%G32><s%> of the church <S%G1577><s%> of the Laodiceans <S%G2994><s%> write; <S%G1125><s%> These <S%G3592><s%> things said <S%G3004><s%> the Amen, <S%G281><s%> the faithful <S%G4103><s%> and true <S%G228><s%> witness, <S%G3144><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%> of the creation <S%G2937><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%>

I know <S%G1492><s%> your works, <S%G2041><s%> that you are <S%G1488><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> cold <S%G5593><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> hot: <S%G2200><s%> I would <S%G3785><s%> you were <S%G1498><s%> cold <S%G5593><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> hot. <S%G2200><s%>

So <S%G3779><s%> then because <S%G3754><s%> you are <S%G1488><s%> lukewarm, <S%G5513><s%> and neither <S%G3777><s%> cold <S%G5593><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> hot, <S%G2200><s%> I will <S%G3195><s%> spew <S%G1692><s%> you out of my mouth. <S%G4750><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> you say, <S%G3004><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> rich, <S%G4145><s%> and increased <S%G4147><s%> with goods, <S%G4147><s%> and have <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> of nothing; <S%G3762><s%> and know <S%G1492><s%> not that you are <S%G1488><s%> wretched, <S%G5005><s%> and miserable, <S%G1652><s%> and poor, <S%G4434><s%> and blind, <S%G5185><s%> and naked: <S%G1131><s%>

I counsel <S%G4823><s%> you to buy <S%G59><s%> of me gold <S%G5553><s%> tried <S%G4448><s%> in the fire, <S%G4442><s%> that you may be rich; <S%G4147><s%> and white <S%G3022><s%> raiment, <S%G2440><s%> that you may be clothed, <S%G4016><s%> and that the shame <S%G152><s%> of your nakedness <S%G1132><s%> do not appear; <S%G5319><s%> and anoint <S%G1472><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%> with eye salve, <S%G2854><s%> that you may see. <S%G991><s%>
As many <S%G3745><s%> as I love, <S%G5368><s%> I rebuke <S%G1651><s%> and chasten: <S%G3811><s%> be zealous <S%G2206><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> and repent. <S%G3340><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I stand <S%G2476><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the door, <S%G2374><s%> and knock: <S%G2925><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man hear <S%G191><s%> my voice, <S%G5456><s%> and open <S%G455><s%> the door, <S%G2374><s%> I will come <S%G1525><s%> in to him, and will sup <S%G1172><s%> with him, and he with me.

To him that overcomes <S%G3528><s%> will I grant <S%G1325><s%> to sit <S%G2523><s%> with me in my throne, <S%G2362><s%> even <S%G2504><s%> as I also <S%G2504><s%> overcame, <S%G3528><s%> and am set <S%G2523><s%> down <S%G2523><s%> with my Father <S%G3962><s%> in his throne. <S%G2362><s%>
He that has <S%G2192><s%> an ear, <S%G3775><s%> let him hear <S%G191><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to the churches. <S%G1577><s%>
